definition: having trading relations (of nations or regions)
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

the five treaty ports forced on Qing China by the 1842 treaty of Nanjing 南京條約|南京条约 that concluded the First Opium War, namely: Guangzhou 廣州|广州, Fuzhou 福州, Ningbo 寧波|宁波, Xiamen or Amoy 廈門|厦门 and Shanghai 上海
treaty port, forced on Qing China by the 19th century Great Powers

sentences.english: Shanghai was one of the first five treaty ports in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 作爲近代中國最早的五個通商口岸之一的上海。

sentences.english: Tang also met with ROK Foreign Minister Yu Myung-hwan.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇還會見了韓國外交通商部長官柳明桓。

sentences.english: They first came to Atlantic Canada to fish and trade with Aboriginal peoples.

sentences.english: Bosworth also held a separate meeting with South Korean Foreign Minister Kim Sung-hwan.

sentences.english: The Mon and Pyu kingdoms were an active overland trade route between India and China.

sentences.english: In between, there is a trade thoroughfare, camels and incessant.

sentences.english: It also examines the relationship between foreign and domestic grains at the trading port level.

sentences.english: He also exported routine items like ambulance equipment and gas-station pumps.
sentences.chinese: 他還出口一些普通商品，如急救設備和加油站的油泵。

sentences.english: Hong Kong was founded as a port for the China trade just over 150 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 香港在150多年前開埠之時是中國的通商港。

sentences.english: Now, LTM, as a member of Toyota Tsusho Group, has entered its new era.

sentences.english: Emphasis will be placed on building more ordinary small and medium-sized commodity housing units.
sentences.chinese: 重點增加中小套型普通商品住房建設。

sentences.english: Which treaty opened Shanghai to foreign trade?

sentences.english: Toyota, the world's No. 1 automaker, has a 20 percent stake in Toyota Tsusho.
sentences.chinese: 世界第一汽車製造商豐田擁有豐田通商20%的股份。

sentences.english: It allotted them five “treaty ports” through which they could conduct commerce with the Celestial Empire.

sentences.english: Yantai is one of China's earliest open port cities.
